Rok Mihevc Foto Projekti Potovanja CV     

Potuje se mi

26 January 2010 – Logatec

Zadnje čase me ima da bi kam šel. V knjigi Timothy Ferriss-a sem zasledil spodnji seznam uporabnih internetnih strani za planiranje potovanj in ga delim za vami.

Kam it?
- virtualtourist.com
- outside.away.com
- escapeartist.com
- gridskipper.com
- lonelyplanet.com/thorntree
- worldtravelwatch.com

Tehnikalije
- kropla.com
- perpetualtravel.com/rtw
- xe.com

Poceni potovanje & stanovanje
- orbitz.com
- priceline.com
- globalfreeloaders.com
- couchsurfing.com
- hospitalityclub.org
- homeexchange.com
- hostels.com
- hotelchatter.com
- craigslist.org
- interhome.com
- rentvillas.com

Gadgeti
- gotomypc.com
- myworldphone.com
- solio.com

Kaj poceti tam?
- transitionsabroad.com
- meetup.com
- writtenroad.com
- eslcafe.com
- jiwire.com
- workingoverseas.com
- wwoof.org
